text: Jeffrey Lionel Dahmer (May 21, 1960 â€“ November 28, 1994) was an American serial killer. He was born in Wisconsin and moved to Ohio in 1966. He murdered 17 men in Wisconsin and Ohio from 1978-1991. In 1992, he was convicted of 15 murders. Dahmer later confessed to 17 murders in all, dating back to his first victim in 1978. The jury rejected Dahmer's insanity defense, and he was sentenced to 15 life terms (life imprisonment is the maximum penalty that Wisconsin has, but not Ohio, which has the death penalty). He was beaten to death with workout equipment by another inmate, Christopher Scarver, who had been jailed for murder, on the morning of November 28, 1994.Jeffrey Dahmer Scarver also killed another inmate, Jesse Anderson, at the same time with the workout equipment. Anderson had been jailed for murder as well. They had all been working out together. Dahmer was diagnosed with three personality disorders: antisocial,Case reports borderline, and schizotypal. == References == Category:1960 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Deaths by beating Category:American murder victims Category:American prisoners sentenced to life imprisonment Category:American rapists Category:American serial killers Category:Criminals from Ohio Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from Ohio Category:LGBT people from Wisconsin Category:Murdered criminals Category:People murdered in the United States Category:People who died in prison custody in the United States Category:People with antisocial personality disorder Category:People with borderline personality disorder
title: Jeffrey Dahmer
